segments.text: I'm observing the kitchen, and there's so much happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently polishing a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unsettling how oblivious she is to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, creating a substantial puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's actually standing in that water, oblivious to the dampness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even hears the constant trickle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the children are up to no good, but she doesn't sense it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks like he's about to topple over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching for those cookies, completely engrossed in his mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing by, ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad to see her so engrossed, missing all the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to tell her what's going on, but I'm just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices before something really bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
